Title: Dreaming Alaska
Writer: Dario D'Ambrosio (screenplay), Dario D'Ambrosio (story), Emanuele Valla (additional scenes)
Actors: Dario D'Ambrosio, Emanuele Valla, Tania Tuccinardi, Silvia Rossi
Plot: Alan and Thomas are bored by their lives. One is a geologist, but works at a university, where the director refuses to finance his once-in-a-lifetime Alaska mission. The other directs a TV ...
